input.sentences: the couple had just gotten married .
people took lots of pictures at their wedding .
the best man made his speech .
they had cake and smothered it on each other 's faces .
the celebrated their marriage with a toast of champagne .
output.sentences: The couple is finally getting married.
All the people are taking pictures at the wedding.
The best man gives a speech at the reception dinner.
The bride and groom are smothered in cake.
A champagne toast is given for a happy marriage.
